snippet: Gold has lost 17 percent of its value since 2011, a remarkable turnabout for an investment that many have regarded as one of the safest of all.
abstract: Gold has lost 17 percent of its value since 2011, remarkable turnabout for investment that many have regarded as one of the safest of all; decline has been so swift that some analysts are declaring the end of golden age of gold, saying it is losing its allure after 650 percent rally from 1999 to August 2011.
lead_paragraph: Gold has lost 17 percent of its value since 2011, a remarkable turnabout for an investment that many have regarded as one of the safest of all.

headline.main: Gold, Long a Secure Investment, Loses Its Luster
headline.print_headline: A Sure Bet Loses Its Luster
